des:
AiGanak Cloud Stats
Hands-free access to your AWS Cost, EC2 Instances and more.

In quick simple steps connect your AWS account with the Cloud Stats skill for Amazon Alexa.

Prerequisite:
1. AWS account.
2. Amazon.com Alexa account.

Get Started:
1. Go to https://stats.aiganak.com
2. Login With Amazon - Sign In using your Amazon account used for Alexa.
3. Add an AWS account to generate a CloudFormation template to provide limited access to your AWS account.
4. Create CloudFormation Stack using the generated template for your AWS account.
5. Enable the Cloud Stats skill on the Alexa app and enable permission to access an email address (used to link your account).
6. Start asking for details of the AWS Cost and Instances.

Pricing:
1. Monthly subscription price of Cloud Stats skill for Amazon Alexa.
2. AWS API calls cost used to access resources and usage details by Cloud Stats via Alexa. AWS will add this cost to your bill.
